cyclone.name: CLAUDETTE
cyclone.current_location: about 310 mi south of Morgan City, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: moving north toward the north-central Gulf Coast, then forecast to arc northeast across the southeastern United States
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Louisiana coast near Morgan City

weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Intracoastal City, LA, eastward to the Okaloosa/Walton County line, FL (including Lake Pontchartrain, Lake Maurepas, and metropolitan New Orleans)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: northern Gulf Coast from coastal Louisiana eastward through the Mississippi/Alabama coasts into the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: Breezy conditions; gusts expected to remain below tropical-storm force at the port
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for Port Freeport, TX
weather_observation.rainfall: Light to moderate rain bands possible; widespread heavy rain focused well east of the port
